overview: For over 65 years, the Corvette has been the first true American sports car, maturing from boulevard cruiser to a hard-core performance machine.  Paul and Todd from Everyday Driver drive 13 Corvettes across seven generations to explore the history, legacy, and contributions the Corvette has made to the world of automobiles.  From the design-driven beginning to the track-conquering present, the guys discuss the people who guided the Corvette, and the changes that made all the difference. Join us for the Corvette story as you've never seen it before!
title: American Original
